SEARCH
Package gw.api.financials

Class BulkPayHelper

java.lang.Object
gw.api.financials.BulkPayHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
PageHelper
public class BulkPayHelper extends Object implements PageHelper
This class does much of the "Behind-the-scenes" work for the Bulk Pay (i.e., Bulk Invoices) user interface. This includes certain action methods for validating, deleting and submitting bulk invoices, as well as methods for obtaining the range of values for various range inputs in the UI. This class is ONLY useful in the context of the Bulk Pay user interface.
Author:
jdonahue

    • BulkPayHelper

  • Method Details

    • flushCache

      public void flushCache()
      Clears the helper's current cache. This should be called whenever the user finishes editing a bulk invoice (either by commit or cancel)

    • getAllBulkInvoices

      public IQueryBeanResult<BulkInvoice> getAllBulkInvoices()
      Provides a query to retrieve all the bulk invoices in the system. This method can optionally be replaced in BulkPay.pcf by getBulkInvoicesForCurrentUser() if customers don't want to return as large a list of invoices.
      Returns:
      a QueryProcessor that encapsulates a query to retrieve all the bulk invoices that have been created.

    • getBulkInvoicesForCurrentUser

      public IQueryBeanResult<BulkInvoice> getBulkInvoicesForCurrentUser()
      Provides a query to retrieve all the bulk invoices created by the current user. This method can be used to replace getAllBulkInvoices() in BulkPay.pcf if customers don't want to return as large a list of invoices.
      Returns:
      a QueryProcessor that encapsulates a query to retrieve all the bulk invoices that have been created by the current user.

    • getBulkInvoicesByStatus

      public IQueryBeanResult<BulkInvoice> getBulkInvoicesByStatus(BulkInvoiceStatus[] status)
      This method create a queryprocessor that filters bulk invoices by bulkinvoicestatus from the input
      Parameters:
      status - bulk invoice status to query from
      Returns:
      a QueryProcessor the contains the query to retrieve all bulk invoices that has the status in the input or all the bulk invoices if no status is indicated

    • newBulkInvoice

      public BulkInvoice newBulkInvoice()
      Creates a new BulkInvoice for edit. The new BulkInvoice is created in the top location's context.
      Returns:
      the newly created BulkInvoice

    • deleteInvoice

      public void deleteInvoice(BulkInvoice invoice)
      Deletes the passed Bulk Invoice. This delete is not finalized until the current location has its changes committed.
      Parameters:
      invoice - the BulkInvoice to delete.

    • prepBulkInvoiceForSave

      public void prepBulkInvoiceForSave(BulkInvoice invoice, CostType defaultCostType, CostCategory defaultCostCategory)
      Perform any necessary preprocessing of the BulkInvoice prior to commiting it to the DB. This includes:

      • Ensuring that none of the inserted/removed BulkInvoiceItems has either a null CostType or CostCategory. If a BI Item has a null CostType or CostCategory, sets the respective argument defaultCostType or defaultCostCategory on the BI Item, if the argument is not null. If an Item's CostType or CostCategory is still null, displays an error.
      Passing in null for defaultCostType and defaultCostCategory will force the user to select Default Cost Type and Default Cost Category in the UI, if "New..." reserve line is to be selected for any items. Note these arguments can be calculated via Gosu (i.e. all Medical Adjusting BIs should use "aoexpense", "medical", if null), or the fields can be set on the BulkInvoiceItem directly.
      Parameters:
      invoice - the BulkInvoice to pre-process.
      defaultCostType - CostType to use if a BI Item's CostType is null. May be null.
      defaultCostCategory - CostCategory to use if a BI Item's CostCategory is null. May be null.

    • clearUnusedReserveLineWrappers

      public void clearUnusedReserveLineWrappers(BulkInvoice invoice)
      Searches the bundle for unused ReserveLineWrappers and marks them as non-persisting.
      Parameters:
      invoice - the invoice whose bundle is to be searched

    • getReserveLines

      public List<ReserveLineWrapper> getReserveLines(BulkInvoiceItem invoiceItem)
      Retrieves the list of payable ReserveLines for a given BulkInvoiceItem so that they can be used as the range of options for a range input. A ReserveLine is considered payable if its claim and exposure (if any) have reached the 'ability to pay' validation level, and at least one of the following is true:

      • ReserveLine has an Exposure, the Exposure is closed and previous payments have been made on it
      • ReserveLine has no Exposure, the Claim is closed and previous payments have been made on it
      • Global PaymentExceedsReserves = true
      • ReserveLine has positive available reserves
      Parameters:
      invoiceItem - the BulkInvoiceItem for which we want the valid ReserveLines.
      Returns:
      a List of ReserveLineWrapper persistent entities, each of which points to an existing ReserveLine (except for the 'New...' option, which has a NULL ReserveLine).

    • getReserveLineDisplayName

      public String getReserveLineDisplayName(ReserveLineWrapper wrapper)
      Determines the correct display value for a ReserveLine in the BulkPay UI. This is determined from the displaynames.xml configuration file, using the "ForEdit" display name type.
      Parameters:
      wrapper - the ReserveLineWrapper that encapsulates the reserve line to be displayed.
      Returns:
      String containing the proper display name for the reserve line

    • getReserveLineDisplayNameForApprovalDetails

      public String getReserveLineDisplayNameForApprovalDetails(ReserveLineWrapper wrapper)
      Determines the correct display value for a ReserveLine in the BulkInvoice Approval UI. This is determined from the displaynames.xml configuration file, using the "ForApproval" display name type.
      Parameters:
      wrapper - the ReserveLineWrapper that encapsulates the reserve line to be displayed.
      Returns:
      String containing the proper display name for the reserve line

    • getExposures

      public List<Exposure> getExposures(BulkInvoiceItem invoiceItem)
      Retrieves the list of payable exposures for this BulkInvoiceItem, assuming the 'New...' reserve line option has been selected for the item (otherwise returns an empty list), filtered by the selected CostType and CostCategory (if any). Only exposures that are "payable" are returned. This means:

      • Exposure has reached the ability to pay validation level
      AND at least one of the following is true:
      • Exposure is closed and has prior payments
      • Exposure is open and does not yet have any reserves
      • Exposure is open and has positive available reserves for the BulkInvoiceItem's current CostType and CostCategory
      • Exposure is open and ClaimCenter is configured to allow payments to exceed reserves
      Parameters:
      invoiceItem - the BulkInvoiceItem whose possible exposures are desired
      Returns:
      a List of filtered payable Exposures

    • clearMessages

      public void clearMessages()
      Clears all messages from the WebMessageContext for the current location

    • validateBulkInvoice

      public void validateBulkInvoice(BulkInvoice bulkInvoice)
      Validate the given bulk invoice (including its items) using the bulk invoice validation plugin
      Parameters:
      bulkInvoice - the bulk invoice to be validated

    • submitBulkInvoiceForApprovalAndCommit

      public void submitBulkInvoiceForApprovalAndCommit(BulkInvoice bulkInvoice)
      Calls submitForApproval() on the BulkInvoice and, unless an exception is thrown, commits the bundle
      Parameters:
      bulkInvoice - the bulk invoice to be submitted

    • getCostTypes

      public List<CostType> getCostTypes(BulkInvoiceItem invoiceItem)
      Retrieves the list of unretired and payable costtypes for this BulkInvoiceItem, assuming the 'New...' reserve line option has been selected for the item (otherwise returns an empty list), filtered by the selected Exposure and CostCategory (if any). Out of the box, the CostType control is not exposed on the BulkInvoiceItemsLV.pcf, but it can be uncommented in the PCF in order to expose it if desired. A CostType is considered payable if at least one of the following is true:
      • The BulkInvoiceItem's Exposure (or claim if no Exposure) is closed and has prior payments
      • The exposure and/or claim is open, but does not yet have any reserves
      • The exposure and/or claim is open and has positive available reserves for the BulkInvoiceItem's current exposure/claim and CostCategory
      • The exposure and/or claim is open and ClaimCenter is configured to allow payments to exceed reserves
      Parameters:
      invoiceItem - the BulkInvoiceItem whose possible cost types are desired
      Returns:
      a List of filtered payable Cost Types

    • getCostCategories

      public List<CostCategory> getCostCategories(BulkInvoiceItem invoiceItem)
      Retrieves the list of unretired and payable costcategories for this BulkInvoiceItem, assuming the 'New...' reserve line option has been selected for the item (otherwise returns an empty list), filtered by the selected Exposure and CostType (if any). Out of the box, the CostCategory control is not exposed on the BulkInvoiceItemsLV.pcf, but it can be uncommented in the PCF in order to expose it if desired. A CostCategory is considered payable if at least one of the following is true:
      • The BulkInvoiceItem's Exposure (or claim if no Exposure) is closed and has prior payments
      • The exposure and/or claim is open, but does not yet have any reserves
      • The exposure and/or claim is open and has positive available reserves for the BulkInvoiceItem's current exposure/claim and CostType
      • The exposure and/or claim is open and ClaimCenter is configured to allow payments to exceed reserves
      Parameters:
      invoiceItem - the BulkInvoiceItem whose possible cost categories are desired
      Returns:
      a List of filtered payable Cost Categories

    • isPaymentTypeValidForItem

      public boolean isPaymentTypeValidForItem(BulkInvoiceItem invoiceItem, PaymentType paymentType)
      Returns whether the provided payment type is valid for the provided BulkInvoiceItem. For example, if the selected reserveline is for a closed exposure/claim then this method will only return true if the payment type is Supplement
      Parameters:
      invoiceItem - the BulkInvoiceItem whose valid payment types are desired
      paymentType - the PaymentType to test
      Returns:
      true if paymentType is valid for invoiceItem

    • cleanupClaim

      public void cleanupClaim(BulkInvoiceItem invoiceItem)
      Called from the BulkInvoice UI when the Claim Number is changed in order to do some necessary post-change processing.
      Parameters:
      invoiceItem - the BulkInvoiceItem for which the claim is being set.

    • getRequiredPaymentType

      public PaymentType getRequiredPaymentType(BulkInvoiceItem invoiceItem)

    • initializePaymentType

      public void initializePaymentType(BulkInvoiceItem invoiceItem, PaymentType defaultValue)
      Sets the PaymentType, taking into consideration any restrictions on the value. 1. If only a single value is legal (e.g. for a closed Claim it can only be Supplemental), set it to that. 2. Otherwise, if the supplied default value is legal, set it to that. 3. Otherwise, set it to the BulkInvoice's DefaultPaymentType.
      Parameters:
      invoiceItem - The item in question
      defaultValue - The value to which to set it, provided it is a legal value.
